articles.title: Sri Lanka vs India series likely to be rescheduled after Covid-19 cases in SL camp - India Today
articles.description: India tour of Sri Lanka: The white-ball series is likely to start on July 17 instead of July 13 after positive Covid-19 cases emerged in the Sri Lankan camp that returned from England. India are set to play 3 ODIs and as many T20Is in the island nation.
